name: Deads will never improve
description:
A fast-paced platformer game inspired by Katana Zero, Hotline Miami and My Friend Pedro

Made in a week as part of MP3.EXE gamejam.

Genre: Action-platformer

Language: Russian (but knowledge of the language is optional)
Used Music:
Nine Inch Nails — 24 Ghosts III
Nine Inch Nails — 5 Ghosts I

Controls:
WASD —  Movement
LMB — Shoot
R — reload  (restart level after death)
Esc — exit (hold)
Alt + Enter — fullscreen

Created by:
Me (pixpnd) - code, graphics, gamedesign
anchousdraws - title illustration
